original_text: These are the sons of Bilhah, whom Laban gave to Rachel his daughter, and these she bore to Jacob—seven persons in all.
korean_text: 이들은 라반이 그의 딸 라헬에게 준 빌하가 야곱에게 낳은 자손들이니 모두 칠 명이라

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Bilhah
whom Laban gave to Rachel his daughter
sentences.korean_translation: 라반이 그의 딸 라헬에게 준 자들이고

sentences.original_text: and these she bore to Jacob
